$  width = 100,
$  height = 100,
$  newWindow = false,
$  newWindowWidth = 800 
) [protected]

Creates a thumbnail.

Parameters:
string The file path (relative to the upload directory). May be a comma list of path
int The thumbnail maximum width
int The thumbnail maximum height
boolean Wheter to add a link to display the original image in a new window
int The maximum width of the new window, if the $newWindow is set
Returns:
string The thumbnail picture(s)
